Row.Text: [ICON_BULLET]Gain the Mercenaries policy for free[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Horse-mounted units have the Strong Mercenaries promotion, making them 20% stronger when hired as mercenaries (thus favored by civilizations and city states that hire mercenaries)
[ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per improved [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% chance per turn that all horse-mounted units gain 1 xp
[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per improved [ICON_RES_IVORY] Elephants[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% extra reduced costs for Favored Techs
[ICON_BULLET]Hunters can establish Camps at +1 range[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Camps within 3 plots of a city
[ICON_BULLET]Gain nearby Yew[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Free Strong Archer (+30% str/rng) promotion for all units in the archer and horse-mounted archer lines.
[ICON_BULLET]Can establish Whaling Boats at +2 range[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Whaling Boats within 3 plots of city.
[ICON_BULLET]All units can enter ocean tiles immediately
[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Watermill and Windmill
[ICON_BULLET] +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Sheep [ICON_RES_SHEEP], Cotton Trees [ICON_RES_COTTON], Silkworms [ICON_RES_SILK] and Dye [ICON_RES_DYE] resources
[ICON_BULLET]Gain Œnology tech[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Vineyards improvement
[ICON_BULLET]Can build the Polder improvement on Marsh
[ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Research and +3 [ICON_STAR] Mana from capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% reduced cost for all arcane techs

[ICON_BULLET]50% of extra Happiness [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] added as [ICON_CULTURE] Culture
[ICON_BULLET]20% extra reduced costs for Favored Techs

[ICON_BULLET]Gain 1 nearby [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% reduced city construction cost for all buildings
[ICON_BULLET]Gain 1 nearby [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% reduced city construction cost for all buildings

[ICON_BULLET]20% extra reduced costs for Favored Techs.
We forsake the sun, the meadow and the gentle breeze. We go into the depths of Éa, to our underdark home that we call Úr.
[ICON_BULLET]Culture [ICON_CULTURE] and Buy [ICON_GOLD] costs for border expansion reduced by 33%
[ICON_BULLET]All specialists provide +1 in their respective yield type
We are folk of the farm, domesticators of plant and animal. Our land and our people are fertile. We will transform this land into farms, pastures and mills as far as the eye can see.
[ICON_BULLET]+15 base relationship with all Gods[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No race penalty for relationship with The Fay
[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Research and +1 Culture [ICON_CULTURE] from every religious building
[ICON_BULLET]Spellcasters gain 50% extra experience from use of [ICON_PEACE] Divine Favor
[ICON_BULLET]+2 Divine Favor [ICON_PEACE] from every religious building
We are masters of the arcane, wise and dangerous. Call us O (if you must address us). It is simple enough for you to remember.
[ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_STAR] Mana from capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All spellcasters gain +50% experience from use of [ICON_STAR] Mana
[ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_STAR] Mana from capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All spellcasters gain +50% experience from use of [ICON_STAR] Mana

Double, double toil and trouble;[NEWLINE]Fire burn, and caldron bubble.[NEWLINE]Fillet of a fenny snake,[NEWLINE]In the caldron boil and bake;[NEWLINE]Eye of newt, and toe of frog,[NEWLINE]Wool of bat, and tongue of dog,[NEWLINE]For a charm of powerful trouble,[NEWLINE]Like a hell-broth boil and bubble.[NEWLINE]Scale of dragon; tooth of wolf;[NEWLINE]Witches' mummy; maw and gulf[NEWLINE]Of the ravin'd salt-sea shark;[NEWLINE]Root of hemlock digg'd i the dark;[NEWLINE]Cool it with a baboon's blood,[NEWLINE]Then the charm is firm and good.
[ICON_BULLET]Free Reagents from first 6 cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 Mana [ICON_STAR] from all improved resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Thaumaturges are always of subclass Witch

[ICON_BULLET]33% more Slaves generated from unit defeat, city conquest and city raizing
